bio.title: # Front-End Developer
bio.paragraph1: With {years} years of experience, I've participated in projects that required high performance and modern interfaces for major companies across various sectors. My focus is on creating scalable solutions with clean code centered on user experience.
bio.paragraph2: Currently, as a Mid-Level Developer at Verisure, I apply industry best practices and technologies to transform complex ideas into simple, intuitive, high-performance interfaces. Combining usability, performance, and innovation in every delivery.

portfolio.title: PORTFOLIO
portfolio.subtitle: A selection of my most impactful projects, demonstrating expertise in full-stack development and innovative solutions.

matrix.title: MATRIX PORTFOLIO
matrix.description: Landing page developed with pure code, inspired by the Matrix universe. Includes multi-language support, automatically detecting browser language and saving preference in localStorage.

gavioes.title: GAVIÕES ACADEMY
gavioes.description: Complete institutional website for Gaviões gym, with responsive structure, dynamic information panels and integration between units, facilitating access to schedules, plans and updates.

superix.title: SUPERIX — WEB SOLUTIONS
superix.description: Complete redesign of the agency's institutional website, with focus on immersive experience, fluid navigation and better service presentation, ensuring enhancement, visual clarity and consistent digital identity.

novaimagem.title: NOVA IMAGEM
novaimagem.description: Development of custom institutional website for hospital maintenance company, prioritizing content organization, information clarity and objective navigation for different user profiles.

prismify.title: PRISMIFY
prismify.description: Free platform for image conversion and compression, running 100% in browser. Supports WEBP, JPEG and PNG with no upload limits and no file sending to external servers.

verisure.title: VERISURE - UPSELLING
verisure.description: Landing page redesign focused on upselling for Verisure, optimizing layout, offer and communication, resulting in a 40% increase in contacts and total conversion of new security items.
